unpublishedAction.name: USER_get_wt_current
jsonPathKeys:
(()=>{
	return {
		user: appsmith.user.email,
		project_place: Slt_pp.selectedOptionValue,
		project_post_type: Slt_ppt.selectedOptionValue,
		search:T_post_list.searchText,
		sort:T_post_list.sortOrder,
		filter:[],
		page_num: T_post_list.pageNo,
		page_size: T_post_list.pageSize,
		offset:(T_post_list.pageNo - 1) * T_post_list.pageSize,
		current_post: appsmith.store.current_post,
		current_wt: appsmith.store.current_wt
	}
})()
